___properties.description: Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults/secrets: Use a parameter of type securestring for this value.  The secret value to store in KeyVault.

___tenantId.description: Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults: The tenant ID of the Azure Active Directory Tenant to use for authorization.

___name.description: Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults: The service tier of KeyVault to use.  Standard supports secrets and software-protected keys.  Premium adds support for HSM-protected keys.

___family.description: Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults: The SKU family to use.

___objectId.description: Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults: The object ID of the Azure Active Directory object to apply this access policy to.  For example, the object ID of a Service Principal, or of a User Principal.

___tenantId.description: Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults: The tenant ID of the Azure Active Directory Tenant containing the objectId in this access policy.
